original_text: If you teach a wise person, he will become even more wise. If you teach a righteous person, he will learn whatever you tell him. If you teach a wise person, he will become even more wise. If you teach a righteous person, he will learn whatever you tell him.
korean_text: 지혜 있는 자에게 교훈을 더하라 그가 더욱 지혜로워질 것이요 의로운 사람을 가르치라 그의 학식이 더하리라

sentences.original_text: If you teach a wise person
he will become even more wise
If you teach a righteous person
he will learn whatever you tell him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 말하는 무엇이든 배울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: If you teach a wise person
he will become even more wise
If you teach a righteous person
he will learn whatever you tell him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 말하는 무엇이든 배울 것입니다
